nodes.text: Red Eleven was the callsign of the eleventh member of Red Squadron. There were a number of starfighter squadrons with this name, and several beings went by the name Red Eleven.
Wenton Chan was a Rebel Alliance pilot that flew with Red Squadron as Red Eleven during the Battle of Yavin. Chan was killed in the assault against the Death Star.

In A New Hope, Red Eleven was unidentified, but his voice could be heard reporting in over the radio. Years later, The Complete Star Wars Encyclopedia finally identified Wenton Chan, a pilot from the Star Wars Customizable Card Game, as Red Eleven.
